bestPractices: Use Chip for compact descriptors such as tags, owners, or status pills â€” they are static text tokens, not buttons.
Never rely on Chip for selection, toggles, or navigation. Pair it with an adjacent Button or Menu action if interaction is required.
Keep labels short; truncate is automatic. Use Tooltip if critical text may be hidden.
Use the built-in variant/size/color props or presets instead of custom inline styles for consistency.
Only expose removal via the dedicated `onDelete` affordance so keyboard and pointer users can target a clear control.
Tie Chip colours to theme tokens so meaning remains clear across light and dark modes.
